item.title: Anyone looking to fill a bill?
item.author: invalid@example.com (Trystinney)
item.dc:creator: Trystinney
item.content:encoded: Hey! My band Disposable Days finally got a drummer, and I’m eager to get a show set up with our new lineup. If anyone is looking to fill a bill let me know!

item.title: TRANS MUSIC SHOW!
item.author: invalid@example.com (Boyintherosegarden)
item.dc:creator: Boyintherosegarden
item.content:encoded: Hi i am maeken ploof a solo performer under boy in the rose garden. I am trying to put together a couple shows that are for trans people to get together and have a good time and perform music! If you are interested in playing please contact me on instagram (boyintherosegarden) or my phone number (3202908513). Thankyou and i hope we can make amazing things happen!

item.title: may day show??
item.author: invalid@example.com (creekbedcarter)
item.dc:creator: creekbedcarter
item.content:encoded: ok i am almost CERTAIN that this probably already happens in this town so lmk if that's true - but IF NOT, i was thinking how rad and cool it would be to put a show together on or around may day where we all play union and labor song covers and/or songs about labor! been itching to organize something like this and i think folks would hella dig it. if you're into playing a set of union songs that last week of april/first week of may, hmu!

item.title: Silverwood OnStage/French Park Music series 2025 opportunities--deadline Feb 12th
item.author: invalid@example.com (Rachael G)
item.dc:creator: Rachael G
item.content:encoded:
Hello I am collaborating with Three Rivers Park District to curate the 2025 season performances in the parks this summer, mostly at Silverwood Park (St. Anthony/MPLS MN) but some at French Park (Plymouth, MN).
I would like to reserve up to 10 out of 19 performance slots for TCUP members. Please review the details below and the attached copy of performance dates and message me directly with your email address if interested!! The deadline for getting applications to me is...

Read more

item.title: Delicate Friend looking booking a show for late March/early April
item.author: invalid@example.com (andrealeonardmusic)
item.dc:creator: andrealeonardmusic
item.content:encoded: Hey! Who wants to play a show together? Delicate Friend just added a new guitarist, and we would love to put a show together in Late March or Early April. Who's down?
